title: Have Researchers Discovered a New ‘Superfuel’ 1,693 Times More Powerful Than Gasoline?
subtitle: A viral marketing campaign called a resource used in lithium batteries a secret superfuel — all with the intent of selling investment tips in an expensive e-book.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Scientists have discovered a fuel thousands of times more powerful than gasoline and just one company is positioned to own a vast majority of its market share.
